There is a charger in the garage for you to power up! ###### West Hills House
#### Home Entertainment
Cable TV
Poker Table
Pool Table
Private Outdoor Hot tub 
Heated Garage/Game room
#### Kitchen Amenities
Chefs Kitchen
Dacor Range
Two Dishwashers
Expansive Island
Prep Sink  
Full Outdoor Kitchen
# Highlights
#### House Features
5 Bedrooms, 4 Baths
Great room with Vaulted Ceilings
2 Separate Living Areas
Gas Fireplaces Throughout
Large Second Floor Deck with Outdoor Kitchen
Access to Sunriver Golf Course
Close to amazing hiking, fly-fishing and Skiing  
Tesla Charging Station
We are currently accepting limited reservations for the summer, book your stay at the West Hills House now!
